title: By the King, a proclamation containing His Majesties gracious and ample indemnity.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Edinburgh, Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., and reprinted at London by John Wallis ...,
notes: "Given at Our Court at White-Hall the Twenty fifth dayof September, 1688. And of Our Reign the fourth Year. By His Majesties Command, Melfort."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
